lead_paragraph: A despatch from N. O., in yesterday's paper announced the arrival of the steamer Yacht at that port, with later advices from the seat of war, in Northern Mexico. We have since received further details of the revolution. The patriots have met with entire success. The action commenced at Camargo, where the Mexicans sustained a defeat. The town was taken by storm,
